description: This file contains utility functions for handling JSON schemas across different model providers, including functions for schema normalization, detection of dictionary fields, and extraction of value types, specifically tailored for providers like OpenAI and Gemini.

methods.name: is_dict_field
methods.description: Checks if a given JSON schema represents a Dict[str, T] field.

methods.name: get_dict_value_type
methods.description: Extracts the value type from a Dict field schema.

methods.name: normalize_schema_for_provider
methods.description: Normalizes a Pydantic-generated schema for a specific model provider such as OpenAI or Gemini.

methods.name: get_response_schema_for_provider
methods.description: Generates a provider-specific response schema from a Pydantic model.
